docs.snippet: Joe Paterno’s family vowed Monday their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse....
docs.abstract: Joe Paterno’s family vows their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse; Penn State student group renames area outside the football stadium from Paternoville to Nittanyville.
docs.lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno’s family vowed Monday their own investigation of the Jerry Sandusky scandal, rejecting the findings of a special investigator who concluded Paterno and others concealed the abuse.

docs.snippet: The two components of any successful effort to control the killing of elephants for their tusks are vigilance at the source and vigilance at the end-market....
docs.abstract: Editorial contends that any successful effort to curb the killing of elephants for illegal ivory must involve increased vigilance at both the source and the end-market for the material; suggests that the only long-term solution lies in improving the economic lives of humans who live among elephants.
docs.lead_paragraph: The two components of any successful effort to control the killing of elephants for their tusks are vigilance at the source and vigilance at the end-market.

docs.snippet: New York State’s program has been beset by rising costs, conflicts of interest and outright fraud in private companies providing these services....
docs.abstract: Editorial calls for stronger oversight to New York State's program of special education services to prekindergarten children with learning, developmental or other disabilities; notes that the program has been beset by rising costs, conflicts of interest and outright fraud at the private companies providing the services.
docs.lead_paragraph: New York State’s program has been beset by rising costs, conflicts of interest and outright fraud in private companies providing these services.

headline.print_headline: Trial Judge to Appeals Court: Review Me
headline.seo: Trial Judge to Appeals Court: Review Me
headline.main: Trial Judge to Appeals Court: Review Me

docs.snippet: A federal district court judge rejected a plea bargain deal in a brave bid to curb a little-known extension of federal prosecutors’ very broad power....
docs.abstract: Editorial welcomes decision by federal judge John Kane to reject a plea bargain deal because it waived the defendant's right to appeal to a higher court; contends that such waivers represent a serious threat to the fairness of the judicial process, and asserts that without an appeals court's policing, the system of pleas then looks more like a system of coercion.
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal district court judge rejected a plea bargain deal in a brave bid to curb a little-known extension of federal prosecutors’ very broad power.

headline.print_headline: Jon Lord, 71, Keyboardist With Deep Purple
headline.seo: Jon Lord, Keyboardist With Deep Purple, Dies at 71
headline.main: Jon Lord, Keyboardist With Deep Purple, Dies at 71

docs.snippet: Mr. Lord’s Hammond B-3 organ — with its signal routed through a Marshall amplifier to give it a distorted tang — was key to Deep Purple’s style....
docs.abstract: Jon Lord, keyboardist of the pioneering British hard-rock band Deep Purple, dies at age 71.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Lord’s Hammond B-3 organ — with its signal routed through a Marshall amplifier to give it a distorted tang — was key to Deep Purple’s style.

headline.print_headline: New Orleans Celebrates the Life of a Bandleader
headline.seo: New Orleans Celebrates Life of Lionel Batiste
headline.main: New Orleans Celebrates the Life of a Bandleader

docs.snippet: Lionel Batiste, who died on July 8, was stylish, unhurried and full of music, just like the city where fans paraded in his honor, as is the local tradition....
docs.abstract: New Orleanians mourn death of Lionel Batiste, local musician and the Treme Brass Brand bandleader, with a stylish and unhurried music-filled parade and funeral procession, following the local tradition.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lionel Batiste, who died on July 8, was stylish, unhurried and full of music, just like the city where fans paraded in his honor, as is the local tradition.

docs.snippet: Not one Republican showed the courage to break ranks and speak up for the disclosure of campaign finance donors....

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Editorial condemns Senate Republicans for filibustering and unanimously rejecting a bill that would enact stronger campaign finance disclosure regulations in accordance with a Supreme Court recommendation in the otherwise disastrous 2010 Citizens United ruling; notes that Republicans have been the main beneficiaries of unprecedented corporate and independent spending sprees, which explains their efforts to kill disclosure.
docs.lead_paragraph: Not one Republican showed the courage to break ranks and speak up for the disclosure of campaign finance donors.

headline.print_headline: A Long Road Home, With Further Still to Go
headline.seo: Schwinden Returns to Mets After Bouncing Around Waiver Wire
headline.main: A Long Road Home, With Further Still to Go

docs.snippet: After bouncing around the waiver wire, Chris Schwinden hopes his return to the Mets organization will last....
docs.abstract: New York Mets minor league pitcher Chris Schwinden has bounced around major and minor league teams since being drafted in 2008; hopes to be called up by the Mets when rosters expand in September.
docs.lead_paragraph: After bouncing around the waiver wire, Chris Schwinden hopes his return to the Mets organization will last.

docs.snippet: Putting a starter pistol in your luggage is a gimmick that values personal advantage over the public good....
docs.abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column cites self-help guru Tim Ferriss as an example of how selfishness run amok is a national disease, if not an international epidemic; argues that many people in today's society are marked by an unabashed willingness to game the system for their own personal advantage, regardless of the cost to their neighbor.
docs.lead_paragraph: Putting a starter pistol in your luggage is a gimmick that values personal advantage over the public good.

headline.print_headline: Donald J. Sobol, 87, Creator Of Encyclopedia Brown
headline.seo: Donald J. Sobol, Creator of Encyclopedia Brown, Dies at 87
headline.main: Donald J. Sobol, Creator of Encyclopedia Brown, Dies at 87

docs.snippet: Mr. Sobol’s books about a clever boy detective made bookworms of many a reluctant reader....
docs.abstract: Donald J Sobol, writer best known for his children's detective book series Encyclopedia Brown, dies at age 87.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Sobol’s books about a clever boy detective made bookworms of many a reluctant reader.
